page.title: 09A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: MY SISTER SETS HER ALARM FOR 7.30 BUT I USUALLY WAKE UP BEFORE THEN.I DON'T GET UP BUT WAIT FOR MY DAD TO BRING ME A CUP OF TEA.AFTER WASHING AND DRESSING I GO DOWNSTAIRS AND HAVE CORNFLAKES OR TOAST.I THEN TAKE MY DOG RUSTY FOR A WALK.I GO TO SCHOOL WITH SAMANTHA.THE BELL GOES AT 9'o C0LOCK.AT 9.15 WE GO IN THE HALL FOR ASSEMBLY AND THEN WE HAVE LESSONS.WE DO A SPELLING TEST AND MENTAL ARITHMETIC TEST EACH WEEK.I HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS AND WE USUALLY HAVE CHIPS,BEANS AND SAUSAGES.I SOMETIMES PLAY CHESS AT DINNER-TIME.OUR LESSONS ARE MATHS,ENGLISH,ART, SCIENCE,PE,MUSIC AND TOPIC.ON FRIDAYS I STOP FOR GYM CLUB.SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.45 AND IN THE SUMMERTIME,I GO HORSE RIDING WITH MY MUM AND SISTER.WHEN WE GET HOME I HAVE MY TEA.I WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL ABOUT 9'o CLOCK AND THEN I GO TO BED.
